Posts.Content: Feb 13, 2010 10:11AM atp2010 wrote:  I AM VERY GLAD FOR YOU..........I AM PRAYING FOR A POSITIVE RESPONSE FOR YOU!   I WOULD LIKE TO ASK FOR ADVICE FROM ANYONE ON GETTING A STEREOTATIC BREAST BIOPSY.   I AM SCHEDULED FOR ONE......I DO NOT HAVE BREAST CANCER, AND  I DO NOT WANT TO HAVE '"TITANIUM CLIPS" INSERTED AND LYING MOTIONLESS FOR ONE HOUR DOES NOT SOUND TOO GOOD........I HAVE 2 MICROCALCIFICATIONS IN MY LEFT BREAST THE SIZE OF GRAINS OF SAND...........I TOLD MY DOCTOR THAT I WOULD RATHER DO A FOLLOW-UP MAMMOGRAM IN 4 MONTHS.........ANY ADVICE WOULD BE GREATLY APPRECIATED. THANK YOU.
